header.rec_loc: At ANON's home in Harston, Cambridgeshire.
header.topics: Hospital appointments and medical procedures, death in family, funeral arrangements, dealing with death and grief, family members expressing emotions in the nuclear family, family relationships, family members’ and friends’ body weight and image; diets; nutrition.
header.activity: Two acquaintances having a cup of coffee.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, anecdote telling
